name: Farmer Toon
description:
FarmerToon is a game where you play as a farmer who inherits a farm. After a tutorial to explain the basics you will be able to take care of your farm. Many activities are possible on FarmerToon like :
- planting, harvesting vegetables and fruits
- raising, feeding, growing and breeding animals
- cooking meals to raise a hunger bar



You will be able to choose a specialty among these three activities to be more efficient.



Competition will be tough ! Trade with other players online via a sales hotel available on your farm that connects players to each other.

On FarmerToon you have to give the plants time to grow, but you won't get bored ! Go to town to join the other players online and shop !
In town you can buy cosmetics, play games in an open fair, buy vehicles to be more efficient in your farm and much more !
Earn achievement points by working on your farm and unlock emotes to amaze your friends !



Log in every day to collect rewards and participate to events.

Become the best farmer in FarmerToon !
